about_the_game:
AnarchyField: Infinite Euphoric Level Destruction is a revolutionary game with a focus on destruction and physics. AnarchyField is a breath of fresh air in the modern gaming industry which lacks and even detests innovation.

You get to be a vehicle or a plane in a small city where you can destroy buildings. This is a shooter where all your dreams about destructible world come true. Only a handful of games would allow you to interact with a destructible world like AnarchyField does.

Now it even has multiplayer! What are you waiting for?



Current features
  • A small destructible city
  • Jet fighters
  • Cars
  • Multiplayer
  • An early look into a sandbox destructible world.

Features coming soon
  • Bigger city maps to destroy
  • More vehicles and content

Jump in to support early access if you seek destruction.

content_descriptors.notes: Compared to other games in the market this game has too much destruction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7 6700k or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No support for controllers at this time. 64bit Windows required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i7 10700k or AMD Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 or AMD RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No support for controllers at this time.

short_description: Tired of boring AAA games? Ever imagined a world where you could destroy everything with your friends? Experience a new cutting-edge technology which lets you experience a destructible world like no other game does. Destroy everything! No walls will remain unscathed.
